4 days ago - On July 18, 2022, GE unveiled the brand names of the companies it had devised through its planned separation: GE Aerospace, GE HealthCare, and GE Vernova. The new companies are respectively focused on aerospace, healthcare, and energy (renewable energy, power, and digital).
